heading: Apex Logistics:
description: Apex Logistics was founded on December 1st, 2021 with the goal of creating a friendly, relaxed, and professional virtual trucking company.

heading: Purple Dragons:
description: We are a UK Based VTC! We started off as friends running around in Euro Truck Simulator 2 doing deliveries and thought why not start our own VTC? growing community of drivers in TMP!
